verses.verse: Thank Yahweh because he does good things for us; he will love us forever as he has promised.
Thank God, the one who is greater than all other gods; he will love us forever as he has promised.
Thank the Lord who is greater than all other lords; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He is the only one who performs great miracles; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He is the one who, by being very wise, created the heavens; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He is the one who caused the ground to rise up above the deep waters; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He is the one who created great lights in the sky; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He created the sun to shine in the daytime; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He created the moon and stars to shine during the nighttime; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He is the one who killed the firstborn males in Egypt; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He led the Israelite people out of Egypt; he will love us forever as he has promised.
With his strong hand he led them out; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He is the one who caused the Sea of Reeds to divide; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He enabled the Israelite people to walk through it on dry land; he will love us forever as he has promised.
But he caused the king of Egypt and his army to drown in it; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He is the one who led his people safely through the wilderness; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He killed powerful kings; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He killed kings who were famous; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He killed Sihon, the king of the Amor people group; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He killed Og, the king of the region of Bashan; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He gave their lands to us, his people; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He gave those lands to us people of Israel, who serve him; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He is the one who did not forget about us when our enemies had defeated us; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He rescued us from our enemies; he will love us forever as he has promised.
He is the one who gives food to all living creatures; he will love us forever as he has promised.
So thank God, who lives in heaven because he will love us forever as he has promised.!
